full_text: Donald Trump when he gets the Email from Elon telling him his account has been reinstated and he can now tweet whatever the hell he wants..... https://t.co/207JTrp0jN

To @elonmusk : I realize you kinda got a lot going on right now but any way you can buy the Pittsburgh Pirates. The cost is only 1.32 billion. Their current owner sucks....much like the leadership at Twitter. Thanks in advance!

@Pirates fans
If the Twitter Sale to Elon Musk gets finalized, I am nominating @TonyBrunoShow to be the new CEO.
